contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Basque|basque}} '''Basque''' may refer to: In '''geography''': * [[Basque Country (greater region)]], the homeland of the Basque people with parts in Spain and France * [[Basque Country (autonomous community)]], an autonomous region of Spain * [[French Basque Country]], situated within the western part of the Pyrénées-Atlantiques In '''humanities''': * [[Basque language]], the ancestral language of the Basque people * [[Basque people]], an ethnic group which primarily inhabits an area known as the Basque Country * [[Basque cuisine]], the cuisine of the Basque people In '''other''': * [[Basque (clothing)]], or old basque, an item of women's apparel * [[Basque (grape)]], another name for white wine grape Crouchen ==See also== {{portal|Basque}} * [[Torsolette]] * [[List of Basques]] * [[Basque conflict]] * {{look from}} * {{in title}} {{disambiguation}} [[hu:Baszk]]
